00039 #include <cstring>
00040 #include <cmath>
00041 #include <cfloat>
00042 #include "Matrix4x4.h"
00043 
00044 const double Epsilon = DBL_EPSILON;
00045 
00046 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( )
00047 {
00048         for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00049         {
00050                 for( int j = 0; j < 4; ++j )
00051                 {
00052                         if( i == j )
00053                                 m[i][j] = 1.0;
00054                         else
00055                                 m[i][j] = 0.0;
00056                 }
00057         }
00058 }
00059 
00060 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( double mat[4][4] )
00061 {
00062         memcpy( m, mat, 16*sizeof( double ) );
00063 }
00064 
00065 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00066                           double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00067                           double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00068                           double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33)
00069 {
00070         m[0][0] = t00; m[0][1] = t01; m[0][2] = t02; m[0][3] = t03;
00071         m[1][0] = t10; m[1][1] = t11; m[1][2] = t12; m[1][3] = t13;
00072         m[2][0] = t20; m[2][1] = t21; m[2][2] = t22; m[2][3] = t23;
00073         m[3][0] = t30; m[3][1] = t31; m[3][2] = t32; m[3][3] = t33;
00074 }
00075 
00076 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( const Matrix4x4& rhs )
00077 : RefCount()
00078 {
00079         for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00080                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j) m[i][j] = rhs.m[i][j];
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool Matrix4x4::operator==( const Matrix4x4& mat ) const
00084 {
00085     if( this == &mat )
00086         return true;
00087     else
00088     return(
00089         ( fabs(m[0][0] - mat.m[0][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00090         ( fabs(m[0][1] - mat.m[0][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00091         ( fabs(m[0][2] - mat.m[0][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00092         ( fabs(m[0][3] - mat.m[0][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00093         ( fabs(m[1][0] - mat.m[1][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00094         ( fabs(m[1][1] - mat.m[1][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00095         ( fabs(m[1][2] - mat.m[1][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00096         ( fabs(m[1][3] - mat.m[1][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00097         ( fabs(m[2][0] - mat.m[2][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00098         ( fabs(m[2][1] - mat.m[2][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00099         ( fabs(m[2][2] - mat.m[2][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00100         ( fabs(m[2][3] - mat.m[2][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00101         ( fabs(m[3][0] - mat.m[3][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00102         ( fabs(m[3][1] - mat.m[3][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00103         ( fabs(m[3][2] - mat.m[3][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00104         ( fabs(m[3][3] - mat.m[3][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00105 }
00106 
00107 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Matrix4x4& mat )
00108 {
00109         for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00110         {
00111                 os << "[ ";
00112                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
00113                 {
00114                         if( mat.m[i][j] < Epsilon && mat.m[i][j] > -Epsilon )
00115                                 os << "0";
00116                         else
00117                                 os << mat.m[i][j];
00118                         if (j != 3)
00119                                 os << ", ";
00120                 }
00121                 os << " ] " << std::endl;
00122         }
00123         return os;
00124 }
00125 
00126 Ptr<Matrix4x4> Matrix4x4::Transpose( ) const
00127 {
00128    return new Matrix4x4( m[0][0], m[1][0], m[2][0], m[3][0],
00129                              m[0][1], m[1][1], m[2][1], m[3][1],
00130                              m[0][2], m[1][2], m[2][2], m[3][2],
00131                              m[0][3], m[1][3], m[2][3], m[3][3] );
00132 }
00133 
00134 Ptr<Matrix4x4> Matrix4x4::Inverse() const
00135 {
00136         int indxc[4], indxr[4];
00137         int ipiv[4] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00138         double minv[4][4];
00139         memcpy( minv, m, 16*sizeof( double ) );
00140         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00141         {
00142                 int irow = -1, icol = -1;
00143                 double big = 0.;
00144                 // Choose pivot
00145                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00146                 {
00147                         if (ipiv[j] != 1)
00148                         {
00149                                 for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
00150                                 {
00151                                         if (ipiv[k] == 0)
00152                                         {
00153                                                 if ( fabs( minv[j][k] ) >= big )
00154                                                 {
00155                                                         big = double( fabs( minv[j][k] ) );
00156                                                         irow = j;
00157                                                         icol = k;
00158                                                 }
00159                                         }
00160                                         //else if ( ipiv[k] > 1 ) tgf::SevereError( "Singular matrix in Matrix4x4::Inverse()" );
00161                                 }
00162                         }
00163                 }
00164                 ++ipiv[icol];
00165                 // Swap rows _irow_ and _icol_ for pivot
00166                 if (irow != icol)
00167                 {
00168                         for (int k = 0; k < 4; ++k)
00169                                 std::swap(minv[irow][k], minv[icol][k]);
00170                 }
00171                 indxr[i] = irow;
00172                 indxc[i] = icol;
00173                 //if ( minv[icol][icol] == 0.0 ) tgf::SevereError( "Singular matrix in Matrix4x4::Inverse()" );
00174                 // Set $m[icol][icol]$ to one by scaling row _icol_ appropriately
00175                 double pivinv = 1.f / minv[icol][icol];
00176                 minv[icol][icol] = 1.f;
00177                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00178                         minv[icol][j] *= pivinv;
00179                 // Subtract this row from others to zero out their columns
00180                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
00181                 {
00182                         if ( j != icol )
00183                         {
00184                                 double save = minv[j][icol];
00185                                 minv[j][icol] = 0;
00186                                 for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
00187                                         minv[j][k] -= minv[icol][k]*save;
00188                         }
00189                 }
00190         }
00191         // Swap columns to reflect permutation
00192         for (int j = 3; j >= 0; j--)
00193         {
00194                 if (indxr[j] != indxc[j])
00195                 {
00196                         for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
00197                                 std::swap(minv[k][indxr[j]], minv[k][indxc[j]]);
00198                 }
00199         }
00200         return new Matrix4x4(minv);
00201 }
00202 
00203 Ptr<Matrix4x4> Mul( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& m1, const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& m2 )
00204 {
00205         double r[4][4];
00206         for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00207                 for( int j = 0; j < 4; ++j )
00208                         r[i][j] = m1->m[i][0] * m2->m[0][j] +
00209                                   m1->m[i][1] * m2->m[1][j] +
00210                                   m1->m[i][2] * m2->m[2][j] +
00211                                   m1->m[i][3] * m2->m[3][j];
00212         return new Matrix4x4(r);
00213 }
